page.title: 19Manager:Rowntree Mackintosh
page.content: {What are the four biggest changes you {have seen in the time you have been at {Rowntrees and could you name two {changes you might expect in the next {five years? 1. The standard of investment in plant and building has improved. The working environment has improved,i.e., the two fingered Kit Kat plant is tiled out and much cleaner and quieter than the other areas. 2.A move away from a shortage of labour problem to one where we are running down the total number of employees. 3.In the last two years there has been a muchgreater acceptance of the need for change. 4.We communicate more to employees about business and the factors that affect jobs,trends and investments. continued on page 20.
